title.narrative: Greater Dhaka Sustainable Urban Transport Project

description.narrative: The project will contribute to develop a sustainable urban transport system (UTS) in GCC, which forms part of north Greater Dhaka, through the delivery of a 20-kilometer (km) bus rapid transit (BRT) corridor. This pilot project provides a holistic solution for integrated urban mobility, bearing a demonstration effect as no modern mass transit system exists in Bangladesh yet.

title.narrative: Reports and Recommendations of the President

description.narrative: The public transport system is improved in DNCC and GCC, benefiting a population of 1 million.

title.narrative: Reports and Recommendations of the President
By 2020: Residents' positive perception of public transport and urban life quality improves by 50% from 2012 baseline.

description.narrative: The public transport system is improved in DNCC and GCC, benefiting a population of 1 million.

title.narrative: Modal share of public transport increases from 40% (2011 baseline) to 50%.
